name: Amplification-Barometer
description: A modular, auditable barometer for amplification-driven systems: computes time-series composites (P, O, E, R, G) and derived indicators (@ = P/O, Δd), with reproducible synthetic regimes, stress tests, and CI-ready tooling for transparent calibration and anti-gaming checks.

name: ChaosTrace
description: ChaosTrace is a lightweight Python toolkit for detecting regime shifts, early foil drop events, and hidden anomalies in high frequency multivariate sailing telemetry using sweeps, phase space reconstruction, and chaos inspired metrics.

name: AstroOracle
description: AstroOracle is a Python package for structured and reproducible astrological analysis, designed for programmatic use, experimentation, and automation.

name: AstroGraphAnomaly
description: AstroGraphAnomaly is an open-source tool that detects unusual astronomical sources in Gaia data by combining feature-based anomaly scoring with a k-nearest-neighbor graph analysis.

name: VerifBio
description: EchoBio is a claim-first tool that audits how well a biological hypothesis is specified, focusing on causal structure, controls, boundary conditions, and independent, falsifiable predictions, without judging whether the claim is true.

name: Tableaux
description: Cohérence interne de la science expérimentale

name: coherence-tables
description: coherence-tables

name: MeteoVoid
description: MeteoVoid is a lightweight, auditable Python toolkit for detecting “data voids” (unexpected gaps) and simple upstream anomaly signals in meteorological time series

name: EchoStack
description: EchoStack is a small, self-contained Python toolkit designed to structure and rigorously audit theoretical claims, mainly in physics (QED, beyond the Standard Model, etc.).

name: IncoGuard
description: FluxGuard — Minimalist upstream data integrity & drift guard for ML pipelines. Pure observation, deterministic soak tests, immutable marks. Prevent subtle shifts before they hit production.

name: EchoNull
description: "Hear the silence. Trace the void. Reveal what should not exist."

name: EchoNull-GAD
description: Hear the silence. Detect the unseen. Lightweight, CI-native sweep framework for graph anomaly detection — massive parameter exploration meets subtle null-trace anomalies, without heavy deep learning.

name: Corpus
description: Corpus Épistémique Opératoire

name: VoidMark
description: Marque éternelle dans le vide — poétique et philosophique. Le coffre immuable qui laisse une empreinte indélébile sans rien altérer.

name: RiftLens
description: Flux nu, brut, sans ajout ni habillage. tout est observé tel quel, sans narration artificielle.

name: BareFlux
description: Lentille qui zoome sur les failles et ruptures en réseau (graphes multivariés). Visuel, précis, scientifique — parfait pour l’observation des liens qui cassent.

name: NullTrace
description: A minimal, reproducible, and CI-stable baseline for deterministic soak testing and artifact generation. This repository intentionally follows a strict src-only layout and contains only two workflows: CI and mass soak tests. No hidden automation, no implicit behavior, no legacy scripts.
